title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP reacts to the news that Gronk is retiring. Does he think this is truly it for the future Hall of Famer? Mike Florio checks in to discuss what's next for Deshuan Watson after settling all but 4 civil suits. And Dodgers Pitching Coach Mark Prior calls in to discuss his career with the Cubs and current state of the Dodgers pitching.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
